meanings.sent1: The heptagonal shape of the stop sign caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The heptagonal table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The heptagonal pizza slices made for a fun and unique party snack.
meanings.sent4: Her heptagonal earrings sparkled like tiny rainbows in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The heptagonal garden maze was a challenging puzzle to solve.

meanings.sent1: The playground had a colorful heptagonal structure for climbing.
meanings.sent2: The heptagonal in the math book helped students understand shapes better.
meanings.sent3: The heptagonal on the flag represented unity among the seven regions.
meanings.sent4: The heptagonal on the necklace symbolized good luck and prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The heptagonal on the floor tile added a modern touch to the room.
